sections.title: How the Revolut referral bonus works
content: You can earn up to €60 for each friend who signs up through your referral link and completes the required actions.
There’s no limit to how many friends you can invite, but only 5 invites count per 20-day promotional cycle.
To trigger the bonus, your friend must order a physical card (€6.99) and make 3 purchases of at least €5 each.
They also need to deposit a minimum of €22 via debit card or instant transfer.
Once all steps are completed, the reward is credited within 1–2 days.

sections.title: Steps to receive the bonus
content: Verify your identity by uploading a valid ID and selfie (KYC).
Top up your account using a debit card in your name or via instant bank transfer.
Order the physical Revolut card (€6.99 shipping cost).
Make 3 qualifying purchases of at least €5 each — online or in-store transactions are accepted.
Note: transfers, gambling, and gift card purchases do not qualify.

sections.title: How to refer friends and earn rewards
content: Share your personal invite link via the Revolut app with friends or family.
Make sure invitees complete all requirements during the promo period.
Track the status of your referrals directly in the app.
Once verified, the reward will be credited to your account automatically.

sections.title: Crypto quiz answers for extra airdrop bonuses
Additional notes and tips
content: Revolut runs a new referral campaign every 20 days — always check your app or email for current details.
Accounts come with a Lithuanian IBAN and require ordering a physical card for €6.99.
The offer is available to users aged 14 and over.
For support or to get your custom referral link, feel free to reach out via Telegram or WhatsApp.
Bonuses and eligibility may vary depending on the current promo and your invite history.
